Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
The youth program registration fee includes accommodations for the week. Each program has unique settings for their meals and sleeping arrangements.

Information for Additional Accommodations in Rexburg

Schedule to arrive the day your program begins and be on time for check-in. If your plans require that you arrive before or leave after the program ends, please contact a local hotel to make arrangements.

Please note: Hotels do require a parental consent before they will accommodate a minor.

OFF-CAMPUS LODGING

These listings are for informational purposes only. BYU-Idaho does not endorse any of these companies nor has BYU-Idaho investigated any of these companies to determine their compliance with state or federal regulations or their business standing. Before using any of these carriers, BYU-Idaho recommends that you determine if they are appropriate for your needs.
